## ClassViz

[[Launch游몬]](https://satrio.rukmono.id/classviz) Visualize your source code. Requires graph extractors (e.g., [Javapers](software.html#javapers) for Java or [Csharpers](software.html#chsarpers) for C#) to generate a JSON file as input for ClassViz, and optionally [Arcana](software.html#arcana) for enrichment.
